# UILetterformAwareSizingRule.oversize

**Case**

Bounds-sizing behavior that displays oversize characters fully but may negatively impact typographic alignment.

## Declaration

```swift
case oversize
```

## Setting bounds-sizing behavior

- **UILetterformAwareSizingRule.typographic**: Standard typographic bounds-sizing behavior, which may clip oversize characters.

items.description: Standard typographic bounds-sizing behavior, which may clip oversize characters.
